timeline.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
timeline.description: Leading development of scalable web applications using modern technologies
responsibilities: Architected and developed full-stack applications serving 100K+ users
Led team of 4 developers using Agile methodologies
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
achievements: Reduced application load time by 60% through optimization
Implemented microservices architecture for better scalability
Led migration from monolith to microservices

timeline.title: Full-Stack Developer
timeline.description: Developed and maintained various web applications and mobile solutions
responsibilities: Built responsive web applications using React and Vue.js
Developed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
Collaborated with UX/UI designers on user interface implementation
Maintained legacy systems and performed bug fixes
achievements: Delivered 8 major projects on time and under budget
Improved code test coverage from 40% to 85%

timeline.title: Master of Science in Computer Science
timeline.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and System Architecture
details: Thesis: 'Scalable Microservices Architecture for E-commerce Platforms'
Relevant coursework: Advanced Algorithms, System Design, Database Systems

timeline.title: React.js Mastery
details: Expert in hooks, context, and performance optimization
Experience with Next.js, Gatsby, and React Native

timeline.title: Backpacking Across Southeast Asia
timeline.description: 3-month solo travel adventure exploring cultures and gaining perspective
details: Learned basic Thai and Vietnamese phrases
Documented journey through photography and blogging
timeline.impact: Enhanced cultural awareness and adaptability skills

timeline.title: Stockholm Marathon Completion
timeline.impact: Demonstrated commitment, perseverance, and goal achievement

timeline.title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate
timeline.description: Validated expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS

timeline.title: React Component Library
timeline.description: Open source React component library with 500+ GitHub stars
details: Built comprehensive component library with TypeScript
